abstract: BlackRock’s fourth-quarter profit jumped nearly fivefold, thanks in large part to a huge influx in fees tied to the $1.85 trillion in assets it acquired by buying Barclays Global Investors.
snippet: BlackRock’s fourth-quarter profit jumped nearly fivefold, thanks in large part to a huge influx in fees tied to the $1.85 trillion in assets it acquired by buying Barclays Global Investors.
lead_paragraph: Completing the biggest deal of its history has been kind to BlackRock, the giant money manager.

headline.main: BlackRock’s Big Deal Gives Huge Boost to Profits
